extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the VirusBarrierX5 or VirusBarrierX6 virus definitions of the computer.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been verified to work on VirusBarrier X5 and VirusBarrierX6. #Check to see if VirusBarrierX5 is installed if [ -f "/Library/Intego/virusbarrier.bundle/Contents/Resources/virusbarriers" ]; then result=`date -j -f "%Y-%m%d" "$(/Library/Intego/virusbarrier.bundle/Contents/Resources/virusbarriers -i | grep vdefsVersion | cut -c 15- | cut -c 1-4)-$(/Library/Intego/virusbarrier.bundle/Contents/Resources/virusbarriers -i | grep vdefsVersion | cut -c 15- | cut -c 5-8)" "+%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00"` echo "<result>$result</result>" else #Check to see if VirusBarrierX6 is installed if [ -f "/Library/Intego/virusbarrier.bundle/Contents/MacOS/virusbarriers" ]; then result=`date -j -f "%Y-%m%d" "$(/Library/Intego/virusbarrier.bundle/Contents/MacOS/virusbarriers -i | grep vdefsVersion | cut -c 15- | cut -c 1-4)-$(/Library/Intego/virusbarrier.bundle/Contents/MacOS/virusbarriers -i | grep vdefsVersion | cut -c 15- | cut -c 5-8)" "+%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00"` echo "<result>$result</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi fi
